doc:
Anne-Marie Deschodt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anne-Marie_Deschodt 0 Anne-Marie Deschodt, épouse de Rougemont (died 21 September 2014, Marsillargues) was a French actress and writer. She was writer Éric Deschodt's sister.From 1965 to 1967, she was director Louis Malle's wife, then from the 1980s of artist Guy de Rougemont. Anne-Marie_Deschodt , épouse_de_Rougemont ( died 21_September_2014 , Marsillargues ) was a_French_actress_and_writer . She was writer_Éric_Deschodt 's_sister.From 1965_to_1967 , she was director_Louis_Malle 's_wife , then from the_1980s of artist Guy de Rougemont .
